title: Episode 102 - Hungarian Revolution Part 2 - Desperation
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary: In this episode we examine the conclusion of the Hungarian Revolution. We explain the Soviet decision to use military force and its consequences for Hungary and the wider Cold War.
